title: Vote Eve
revealed_to_reader: Night before vote: Aria lost control completely - programming override
Marcus stopped her from killing Kenji
VOTE FAILED - humanity chose immortality over authenticity
The Archivist appeared globally - offered upload
Archivist waited for lock rejection, now offers 'better immortality'
Binary became ternary: lock vs backup vs upload
continuity: Day 60, vote failed, Archivist's public campaign began, upload acceleration
